Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Northbound Reroute near Harlem/Armitage
ShortDescription: Northbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, North Avenue, Oak Park, Grand then resume their normal route on Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, North Avenue, Oak Park, Grand  then resume their normal route on Harlem, due to street blockage near Harlem/Armitage.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute at 87th/South Chicago
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses are temp rrtd in both directions via Commercial. 83rd, Yates, 87th and resume their normal route, due to police activity near 87th/South Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial. 83rd, Yates, 87th and resume their normal route, due to police activity near 87th/South Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.
